short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ensure every single password you have is safe and secure - and saves the password in a text file so you will never forget!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This random password generator provides a lot of unique features such as:

The ability to customize the password according to its length as well as the type of characters that will be included in the password whether that be: symbols, letters, or numbers.

The ability to save the password in a text file on you computer with what you need the password for, and the generated password in case you ever forget

The ability to copy the password to your clipboard, so if it ever gets too long, just press that button!

Hope you enjoy using this product! If there are any questions/concerns, feel free to leave a review.
